p:
Diaspores often present with multiple dispersal modes to enable spread via different agents
14, 16 . We listed 21 dispersal modes associated with the following 5 dispersal strategies (i.e., 5 dispersal vectors): gravity or the plant itself (autochory), wind (anemochory), water (hydrochory), wild or domestic animals (zoochory), and humans (anthropochory) (Fig. 1). Detailed descriptions are mentioned in the Supplementary Materials)
10, 15– 17 .
